title: First U.S. Virus Death Came Weeks Before Previously Thought
itunes:title: First U.S. Virus Death Came Weeks Before Previously Thought
description:
Bloomberg News U.S. Health Care Team Leader Drew Armstrong shares his insight on information surfacing that the first U.S. virus death came weeks before previously thought. Bloomberg Intelligence Senior Airlines Analyst George Ferguson breaks down Delta earnings. Businessweek Economics Editor Peter Coy talks about his story “The Oil Price Crash in One Word: ‘Inelasticity’.” And we Drive to the Close with Henry Cornell, Founder of Cornell Capital.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.


See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
